price: 27. Ee ah kuwa iyagu ka baqa cadaabka Rabbigood.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna hum min ʿadhābi rabbihim mush'fiqūna
